title: Wizard of Oz Glinda Costume for Girls
features: PRODUCT INCLUDES: The Glinda the Good Witch for girls comes with light pink dress and a silver Glinda crown.

FROM THE FUN COMPANY: Costumes are more fun when they're authentic which is why we're proud to offer our officially licensed costumes from the Wizard of Oz. This Glinda costume for kids is the perfect way for your child to play the part of the Good Witch of the North.

AUTHENTIC DETAILS: This Glinda the Good Witch Costume has plenty of great details that little girls will love. The dress comes in the soft, pink color scheme seen in the film. The dress has skirting beneath the outer skirt to add a pleasant poof to the look. Attached pink butterflies give it a whimsical look and the puffy sleeves round out the costume's authentic style.

TOP QUALITY: We use quality construction methods and durable materials to ensure our customers get the most out of each and every one of our Made By Us costume designs. With proper care, this Glinda Wizard of Oz outfit for girls will last for use again as a hand me down or to donate for reuse.

MADE TO FIT: Available in girl's sizes S, M, L, and XL this kid's Glinda costume is designed to comfortably different body shapes. We use real kids and detailed measurements to size all of our costumes, but please be sure to double check our child size chart to find the best fit.
description: The Fun Costumes Wizard of Oz Glinda Costume for Kids When it's time for your little ones to experience the magic of Wizard of Oz, this Glinda the Good Witch Costume offers a simple dress and crown combination for kids to recreate the unforgettable character's style. The girl's dress comes in a light pink color that mimics the look from the movie. It comes with dazzling details, like glittering stars on the chest and even an attached pink butterfly near the shoulder. It also has an attached, faux gemstone brooch on the chest. The sleeves are a puffy leg-o-mutton style and each one cinches mid-arm with elastic bands. The skirt features soft tulle with glitter designs and even has skirting underneath to create a nice, poofy style. Every Glinda Costume needs to have a crown and this one comes with the perfect one to top off the whole look. The silver crown fits with a hook and loop fastener and features plenty of glitter and pink, faux jewels on it. The entire costume combines for a look that really does capture the spirit of the character and since it's an officially licensed Wizard of Oz costume, you can be sure your child will have an authentic Wizard of Oz experience! Product Details: 100% polyester Skirting underneath to give a poof Soft tulle on top with glitter design Pink butterflies attached White jewel in middle of chest Crown with hook and loop closure Glittery & pink jewels on crown Puffy leg-o'-mutton sleeves cinch at mid-arm with elastic band Officially licensed Size Chart: S: Chest=26"; Waist=20" - 28"; Length=39" M: Chest=28"; Waist=22" - 30"; Length=42" L: Chest=30"; Waist=24" - 34"; Length=47" XL: Chest=32"; Waist=28" - 36"; Length=52" About Us: Fun Costumes are exclusively Made By Us and begin with passion, teamwork, and industry expertise decades in the making. Our products are proof that with the right people even a simple idea can grow into something incredible. We started in a small garage in Minnesota, providing costumes to our local community,
